tit.cmt: Imperial family→Imperial Family と修正しました。

sen.j: 百済王（くだらのおおきみ/くだらのみこ、生没年不詳）は、飛鳥時代の皇族。
sen.e: Kudara no Okimi or Kudara no miko (date of birth and death unknown) was in the Imperial family in the Asuka period.
Kudara no Okimi, also referred to as Kudara no miko (year of birth and death unknown) was in the Imperial Family in the Asuka period.
sen.cmt: or→also referred to as,date→year,Imperial family→Imperial Family と修正しました。
sen.e: Kudara no Okimi, also referred to as Kudara no miko (year of birth and death unknown) was in the Imperial Family in the Asuka period.

sen.j: 敏達天皇の孫（『新撰姓氏録』）。
sen.e: He was a grandchild of Emperor Bidatsu ("Shinsen Shojiroku [Newly Compiled Register of Clan Names and Titles of Nobility]).
He was a grandchild of Emperor Bidatsu ("Shinsen Shojiroku" [Newly Compiled Register of Clan Names and Titles of Nobility]).
sen.cmt: the を補いました。クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: He was a grandchild of Emperor Bidatsu ("Shinsen Shojiroku" [Newly Compiled Register of Clan Names and Titles of Nobility]).

sen.j: 父は押坂彦人大兄皇子と推定される。
sen.e: It is assumed that his father was Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko.
It is assumed that his father was Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko.
It is assumed that his father was Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko.
He is also called Imperial prince Kudara.
He is also called the Imperial Prince Kudara.
sen.cmt: the を補いました。 Imperial prince→Imperial Prince と修正しました。
sen.e: He is also called the Imperial Prince Kudara.

sen.j: 『古事記』敏達段の押坂彦人大兄皇子の系譜に百済王の名は見えず、妃糠手姫皇女所生の多良王（たらのみこ、舒明天皇同母弟）である可能性（「久多良王」の「久」が脱落したか？）が大きいと推察される一方、妃大俣王所生の茅渟王（ちぬのみこ、皇極天皇・孝徳天皇の父）と同一人と推定する説もある。
sen.e: In "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), there was no name of Kudara no Okimi in Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko's genealogy in the Emperor Bidatsu's section, it is highly possible that Tara no miko ("Ku" in "Kutara" may have been dropped?) born to Nukadehime no himemiko (a younger maternal half-brother of Emperor Jomei), on the other hand, there is another theory saying that he was Kinu no miko (father of Emperor Kogyoku and Emperor Kotoku) born to Omata no miko.

In "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), there was no name of Kudara no Okimi in Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko's genealogy in the Emperor Bidatsu's section, it is highly possible that the Kudara no Okimi was Tara no miko (a younger brother-uterine of the Emperor Jomei) who was born to Nukadehime no himemiko ('Ku' in 'Kutara no miko' may have been dropped?); on the other hand, there is another theory saying that he was Kinu no miko (the father of the Emperor Kogyoku and the Emperor Kotoku) born to Omata no miko.
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。オーダーを修正しました。Kutara→Kutara no miko,maternal half-brother→brother-uterine,the と修正しました。the を補いました。パンクチュエーションを修正しました。
sen.e: In "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), there was no name of Kudara no Okimi in Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko's genealogy in the Emperor Bidatsu's section, it is highly possible that the Kudara no Okimi was Tara no miko (a younger brother-uterine of the Emperor Jomei) who was born to Nukadehime no himemiko ('Ku' in 'Kutara no miko' may have been dropped?); on the other hand, there is another theory saying that he was Kinu no miko (the father of the Emperor Kogyoku and the Emperor Kotoku) born to Omata no miko.

sen.j: 『姓氏録』に系譜と名が記載されるのみで、事績は不詳。
sen.e: Since only his genealogy and name were recorded in Shojiroku (Register of Clan Names and Titles of Nobility), his achievements was unknown.
Since only his genealogy and name were recorded in "Shojiroku" (Register of Clan Names and Titles of Nobility), his achievements was unknown.
sen.cmt: クォーツを補いました。
sen.e: Since only his genealogy and name were recorded in "Shojiroku" (Register of Clan Names and Titles of Nobility), his achievements was unknown.

sen.j: 同書によれば、大原氏・島根真人・豊国真人・山於真人・吉野真人・桑田真人・池上氏・海上真人・清原真人・池上椋人各氏の祖とされている。
sen.e: According to the Shojiroku, he was an ancestor of Ohara clan, SHIANE no Mahito, TOYONOKUNI no Mahito, YAMAO no Mahito, YOSHINO no Mahito, KUWATA no Mahito, Ikegami clan, UNAKAMI no Mahito, KIYOHARA no Mahito and IKEGAMI no Kurahito.

According to the Shojiroku, he was the ancestor of these clans: the Ohara clan, the SHIANE no Mahito, the TOYONOKUNI no Mahito, the YAMAO no Mahito, the YOSHINO no Mahito, the KUWATA no Mahito, the Ikegami clan, the UNAKAMI no Mahito, the KIYOHARA no Mahito and the IKEGAMI no Kurahito.
sen.cmt: an→the と修正しました。パンクチュエーションを修正し、the を補いました。
sen.e: According to the Shojiroku, he was the ancestor of these clans: the Ohara clan, the SHIANE no Mahito, the TOYONOKUNI no Mahito, the YAMAO no Mahito, the YOSHINO no Mahito, the KUWATA no Mahito, the Ikegami clan, the UNAKAMI no Mahito, the KIYOHARA no Mahito and the IKEGAMI no Kurahito.
